channel.title: Most annoying cache ever!
channel.description: this cache is such a pain in the ass, every time i extract it, it makes it so that you get two folders. One that should be there and one that dont...it makes the directory PimePKcache--->PrimePKcache--->files. seems like no matter how i compile it or zip it, it ends up being a folder and a sub foler, when all i need is a folder...help plz?

item.title: Most annoying cache ever!
item.dc:creator: @2_drag_claws 2 drag claws
item.description:
@2_drag_claws wrote:

this cache is such a pain in the ass, every time i extract it, it makes it so that you get two folders. One that should be there and one that dont…it makes the directory PimePKcache—>PrimePKcache—>files. seems like no matter how i compile it or zip it, it ends up being a folder and a sub foler, when all i need is a folder…help plz?
